title: Evaporation
question: 哪些是 factor that affect the rate of evaporation / faktor mempengaruhi kadar penyejatan ?
C: Exposed surface area of water / Luas permukaan air yang terdedah
E: Colour of the water / Warna air
F: Depth of the water / Kedalaman air
G: Type of container material / Jenis bahan bekas
H: Presence of dissolved salt / Kehadiran garam terlarut

question: Humidity / Kelembapan 越高，Rate of evaporation / Kadar penyejatan 越
Surrounding temperature / Suhu persekitaran 越高，Rate of evaporation / Kadar penyejatan 越
Movement of air / Pergerakan udara 越高，Rate of evaporation / Kadar penyejatan 越
Exposed surface area of water / Luas permukaan air yang terdedah 越大，Rate of evaporation / Kadar penyejatan 越
